machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G21 ;metric values
M107;
G28 ;Homing
M420 S1 ;
G90 ;absolute positioning
G92 E0; reset extruder distance
G1 X0 Y0 Z5 F5000 ;move nozzle up 5mm for safe homing
G29 ;ABL
M500 ;
M82 ;set extruder to absolute mode
M107 ;start with the fan off
G1 X0 Y0 Z15.0 F5000 ;move the platform down 15mm
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length
G1 F200 E3 ;extrude 3mm of feed stock
G1 F200 E0 ;Retract
G4 S2 ;Wait for material to fall
G1 F200 E3
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length again
;Put printing message on LCD screen
M117 Printing...

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
M104 T0 S0 ;extruder heater off
M104 T1 S0 ;extruder heater off
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G91 ;relative positioning
G1 E-1 F300 ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
G1 Z+0.5 E-5 X-20 Y-20 F3000 ;move Z up a bit and retract filament even more
G0 X0;move X min endstops, so the head is out of the way
G0 Y50;move Y to front, so the head is out of the way
M84 ;steppers off
M107
G90 ;absolute positioning
